title: perform_orca_reconcile Lambda Output
description: The output for the perform_orca_reconcile Lambda.

jobId.description: The unique ID of the reconciliation job.

collection_id.description: Collection ID from the ORCA Collection object the file belongs to.

granule_id.description: Granule ID from the ORCA Granule object the file belongs to.

file_name.description: File name from the ORCA File object the file belongs to.

key_path.description: Key path that includes the file name from the ORCA File object the file belongs to.

orca_etag.description: Etag value from the ORCA File object the file belongs to.

s3_etag.description: ETag key value from S3 listing.

orca_last_update.description: Last Update value from the ORCA File object the file belongs to.

s3_last_update.description: LastModified key value from the S3 listing.

orca_size.description: Size value from the ORCA File object the file belongs to.

s3_size.description: Size key value from the S3 listing.
